document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">live </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">live </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">die </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">die </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">smile </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whole </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Through </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">faith </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">met </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">introduce </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">soul </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">scene </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">familiar </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">untraversed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">spot </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">contemplate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">journey </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">unpuzzled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">heart </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Such </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">trust </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">among </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Among </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">today </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">saw </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">launching </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Never </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">sailed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">Bay! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Could live - did live
